channel.title: bluecoat on Mike's ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in bluecoat on Mike's ramblings

item.description: Suppression of authentication log entries:- <Exception> exception.id=(”authentication_redirect_from_virtual_host”, “authentication_redirect_to_virtual_host”, “authentication_failed”) access_log[main](no) And to get a dump of the config, though the “unencrypted” option doesn’t seem to work on SGOS 4.2.3 configure t line-vty length 0 show version show status show configuration with-keyrings unencrypted length 80 exit exit exit
